subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Samuel Wanjiru died in 2011 after falling from a balcony at his home, but a Kenyan government pathologist said it was not possible for the fall to have caused the head injuries that killed him.
snippet: Samuel Wanjiru died in 2011 after falling from a balcony at his home, but a Kenyan government pathologist said it was not possible for the fall to have caused the head injuries that killed him.
